channel.title: Players at PK- Command request
channel.description:
Hey guys, im a long time coder but I cannot think of ANY way to make this..
1st of all I wanted to make a line saying this any time people entered Pk.
"+playername has endered PK! There are now (# of players) at PK!"
Now I know this for the first part, [code] PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "User: " + playerName + " has just entered PK!! ";[/code]
But how would I manage to add how many people are there? Plz respond! -Tony

item.title: Players at PK- Command request
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Thanks for helping guys.
Did not work yet,but thanks for trying

Read full topic

well i saw on a lot of clients that it said the number of people nearby. This could replace it but i dunno how sorry

item.title: Players at PK- Command request
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

That would be quite a bit of work. But make a int named like peopleInWild or whatever. Then increase it along with the sendmessage and decrease it when they leave. (would also need to be for tele commands and teleports out of wild)

Read full topic

                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "User: " + playerName + " has just entered PK!! ";
